title: Riot stop nerfing Rek'Sai's damage
body:
She was *supposed* to be a bruiser, and now you've nerfed her so many times she pretty much is forced to build like Mundo. Pretty soon she's gonna turn into Elise 2.0, or even worse, pre-rework Evelynn who just gets nerfed so many times they aren't even viable.

Did you not learn from Kha'Zix, Elise, Pantheon, Olaf, Xin Zhao, Alistar, Vi, Volibear, Udyr, Warwick, AD Nidalee, Kayle, Jarvan, Gnar, Akali, and----

Holy shit you get the point. You can't just let a champion have tons of free damage reduction so the build full damage and can tank, or have so much base damage they build full tank and melt everyone.

Seriously, look at Garen-- Super tanky, but literally no damage at all. Balanced champion. Look at Draven, metric fuckton of damage, but at the cost of little utility and being able to be zoned away from axes. Balanced.

Now look at past mistakes. Kha'Zix, full damage, goes invis to take 50% reduced damage. Lead to him eventually getting gutted. Akali had a similar mechanic on her W, led to a few nerfs and resulted in making her kit clunky as hell. I don't need to talk about Olaf or Elise.

---------------------------
Riot, don't do this to Rek'Sai. You already gutted her damage so she can't be a bruiser, you can't gut her utility. That literally leaves her to be a meat shield.  You're going to nerf her to the point where she is pretty much Mundo 2.0 who just sits there absorbing hits for your carry, and in an actual fight is just a minor inconvenience.

If you want her to be a bruiser then something else has to give. She currently has:

- Top tier mobility
- A unique way of seeing people in the fog of war
- An AoE knockup
- Resourceless 

That's too much advantages for her to be a top tier bruiser on top of it. Why would you ever play other bruisers such as Renekton if she could match his damage? You simply wouldn't.

To your second point, she can also see stealthies. Understandably given how the skill should work. Just wanted to point it out though ^.^ Found out when I could not gank top lane rek as evelynn EVER. Mildly frustrating.

yea i never saw why rek got nerfed so much in first place.  her damage was mediocre at best in first place and she had to build tanky cause she wasnt naturally one, not even that great of mobility unless the enemy is foolish enough to leave her tunnels to be reused.

The problem is rek'sai's Q synergy with {{item:3077}} or {{item:3074}} .. also the fact that at max fury she can deal upto 240% AD .. It's a possible true damage execute that scales very hard with ad.. I feel like it's just hard to balance a champion like that because of the way her power budget is divided throughout her kit. Also global map presence is something that would take up a huge portion of said budget. Rek'sai does honestly have an overloaded kit.. though her mains and "mains" don't want to admit it. Gap closer, sustain, aoe, knock up, long range poke which can give vision of enemies in fog of war/brush, mobility, global presence possibility,  and possible true damage execute... also don't forget tremor sense! XD and a perma attack speed steroid passive.

Her gap closer is on a very long cooldown and is extremely telegraphed. Her knockup can only occur once within quite a long time-frame, so you are likely only to get one knockup off on a target in a fight. Her long range poke is mediocre at best and is only useful for scouting areas and bushes. The true damage execute might be over the top but it requires you to be in the fight pretty long. I'm not even a Rek'Sai main, or "main" as you like to say, I'm just saying her kit isn't really that much different from any other bruiser, with the only different thing I can think of is the map pressure and tremor sense, and she sacrifices a combat ultimate for said map pressure.

All i'm saying is that  she's not nearly as bad as they make her seem. I still feel she is viable and has her niche. Also to clarify a Main is someone who plays a champ and loves playing them no matter what, a "main" is someone who plays them because they're over the top in strengths, etc. She has an incredibly loaded kit lol.
